name: No Korok forest fog
desc: Removes the fog in the Korok Forest. OPTIONAL : Only happens once the 4 Korok forest's shrines have been activated.

single.name: Mode
single.desc: Choose between the two available modes.

options.name: Always active
options.desc: The fog is always removed, at any time.

options.name: Trials of the Forest Quest
options.desc: In order for the fog to disappear, you have to open (completing is not necessary) the four shrines in the Korok Forest.
